sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Modal, Button, Row, Col, Form } from "react-bootstrap"; import axios from "axios"; class AddMeeting extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); this.state = { date: "", name: "", email: "", subject: "", start: "", end: "", meetingRoomId: this.props.meetingRoomId, }; } handleChange = (e) => { const itemName = e.target.name; const itemValue = e.target.value; this.setState({ [itemName]: itemValue }); }; refreshList() {} handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); axios .post("https://localhost:44388/api/Bookings", { date: e.target.date.value, name: e.target.name.value, mail: e.target.mail.value, subject: e.target.subject.value, start: e.target.start.value, end: e.target.end.value, meetingRoomId: e.target.meetingRoomId.value, }) .then((res) => this.setState({ meetings: [...this.state.meetings, res.data] }) ); }; render() { return ( Add Meeting
); } } export default AddMeeting;
